resources.string: Please enter your email address below, and we will send you a verification code to reset your password
Please enter your the 4 digit verification code from your email
Use your new password to login and get started

We are thrilled to have you as a new member of the Pocket Birdies community! \n\n Pocket Birdies is designed to help connect golfers and golf instructors. Please select below if you are a wanting to join as golfer looking to book lessons, or a golf instructor looking to give lessons
Please start by entering an email and password to be connected to your account.
Please fill out your basic profile information
If you\'re a beginner, select N/A
If you don\'t know, select N/A
You are now ready to get started! \n\nYou can now login and get finish setting up your custom profile.
Director of PGA TOUR\'s Performance Center at TPC Sawgrass, 2010 PGA National Teacher of the Year. Ping Brand Ambassador, Polo Golf Advisory Staff
You will be redirected to the payment screen. \n\n Continue booking this lesson?

string.name: about_us
string.font:
Pocket Birdies is a platform designed to make improving at golf more simple, by connecting players to our coaching partners, from formal golf instruction to leveraging their knowledge of top-tier training content, drills, and equipment.

Stay up to date and follow our socials for exclusive special offers @pocketbirdies 

Website:
